source: # In case there are Leavers not yet in hr_record_fact

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW record_fact_from_leavers

--     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Pers_No, --- YES
    CoCd, --- YES
    Company_Code, --- YES
    Loc, --- YES
    Location,
    PS_group, --- YES
    Pay_Band_Description,
    Org_unit, --- YES
    Organizational_Unit, --- YES
    PA, --- YES
    Personnel_Area,
    Personnel_Subarea, --- YES
    WorkC, --- YES
    Work_Contract,
    to_timestamp(Org_Start_Date) AS Org_Start_Date,
    Leaving,
    Act,
    Action_Type,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Employee_No,
    Position, --- YES
    Position_1,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    User_ID,
    Email_Address,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position, --- YES
    MAnager_Position_Text,
    LM_E_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers_temp
WHERE Pers_No NOT IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact) AND RN = 1;
## Load new lines for leavers not in hr_record_fact

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact (
    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    EmployeeGroupID,
    PayrollAreaID,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    )

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (order by T2.EmployeeID) as HRRecordID,
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T1.CoCd,
    T1.Company_Code,
    T3.PersonnelAreaID AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T4.PersonnelSubAreaID AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T5.OrganisationUnitID AS OrganisationalUnitID,
    T6.ContractID AS ContractID,
    T7.PayBandID AS PayBandID, -- NULLS occur due to contractors
    T8.CostCenterID AS CostCenterID,
    T9.PositionID AS PositionID,
    T10.ManagerEmployeeID AS ManagerEmployeeID,
    TempMPID.PositionID AS ManagerPositionID,
    T11.LocationID AS LocationID,
    T12.WorkScheduleID AS WorkScheduleID,
    T13.EmployeeGroupID,
    T13b.PayrollAreaID,
    T14.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T2.EmployeeID, IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                IFNULL(NULL, '.'), IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'),IFNULL(T13.EmployeeGroupID, '.'),IFNULL(T13b.PayrollAreaID, '.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1 
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.EmployeeNumber AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim T3 ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim T4 ON T1.PSubArea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND T1.Personnel_SubArea = T4.Description AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_organisation_unit_dim T5 ON T1.Org_unit = T5.OrganisationUnit and
                                                        T1.Organizational_Unit = T5.Description AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim T6 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND 
                                                CASE 
                                                        WHEN T1.CT IS NULL
                                                        THEN 'N/A'
                                                        ELSE T1.CT
                                                END = T6.ContractTypeCode AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim T7 ON T1.PS_group = T7.PSGroupCode AND T7.IsActive = 'Y' -- NULLS occur due to contractors
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_costcenter_dim T8 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode AND T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim T9 ON T1.Position= T9.PositionCode AND T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim TempMPID ON T1.Manager_Position = TempMPID.PositionCode AND TempMPID.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10 ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_pins_location_dim T11 ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode AND T11.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN (
            SELECT T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim T1
            INNER JOIN ( SELECT EmployeeID, Max(AbsenceEndDate) as Max_AbsenceEndDate
                         FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim
                         Where IsActive = 'Y'
                         GROUP BY EmployeeID ) T3        ON  T1.EmployeeID = T3.EmployeeID AND
                                                             T1.AbsenceEndDate = T3.Max_AbsenceEndDate
            where IsActive = 'Y'
            GROUP BY T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            
    ) T12 ON T2.EmployeeID = T12.EmployeeID  -- NULLS occur as no data for some employees in the absence file

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_EmployeeGroup_dim T13 ON T1.EEGrp = T13.EEGrp and T13.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payroll_area_dim T13b ON T1.PArea = T13b.PayrollAreaCode and T13b.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T14 ON "SAP HR" = T14.Description AND T14.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE T2.EmployeeID IS NOT NULL;
